title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AI for VMware migrations with AWS Transform for VMware (MAM202)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Transform for VMware 实现 VMware 迁移的智能体 AI (MAM202)
abstract: Accelerate your VMware migration journey with AWS Transform, the first agentic AI service for large-scale VMware workload migrations to Amazon EC2. Discover how to migrate from on-premises VMware infrastructure to a modernized, cloud-native architecture while overcoming challenges like evolving licensing models and vendor lock-in. Meet the team behind AWS Transform and see a live demonstration showcasing automated application discovery, dependency mapping, network translation, wave planning, and server migration with optimized EC2 instance selection. Learn practical approaches to streamline large-scale migrations and modernize VMware workloads to AWS with greater speed and confidence.
abstract_cn: 使用 AWS Transform 加速您的 VMware 迁移之旅，这是首个用于大规模 VMware 工作负载迁移到 Amazon EC2 的智能体 AI 服务。了解如何从本地 VMware 基础设施迁移到现代化的云原生架构，同时克服不断变化的许可模式和供应商锁定等挑战。认识 AWS Transform 背后的团队，观看实时演示，展示自动化应用程序发现、依赖关系映射、网络转换、批次规划以及通过优化 EC2 实例选择进行服务器迁移。学习简化大规模迁移的实用方法，以更快的速度和更高的信心将 VMware 工作负载现代化迁移到 AWS。

presenter.name: Sean Lewis
presenter.title: Director, Enterprise Apps, Migration and Modernization
